name: Correct Falsehoods.
description:
This is a proof of concept, done in 3 days to prove to myself that I could. 

This is freeware, please feel free to share it with your friends, but I also ask that if you would like to see more of this game, or an enhanced remake, that you reach out and encourage me to improve or try again.

This is canon to the wider set of media that I have created.
